XIII.i.3.H.2.e
.
Notifying Survivors of Their Potential Entitlement to CHAMPVA
When notifying a survivor of an initial award of DIC, include as an attachment to the decision notice
VA Form 21P-8765, Service-Connected Death Award Attachment
.Â  This form describes the eligibility requirements for CHAMPVA and contains instructions for applying for this benefit.
title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section H - Civilian Health and Medical Program of the Department of Veterans Affairs (CHAMPVA) Eligibility Determinations
citation: Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 3, Section H
